Text: IBM Americas CEO Conference June and it would be great if you could arrange your schedule to attend IBMs CEO conference which begins with a dinner on June and includes a full day program on June We plan to have CEOs in attendance and this will give you a chance to meet a few of the other senior executives of IBM including Lou Gerstner Sam Palmisano will also be there Ive included some information below on the conference attendees at the last session and tentative agenda which may help you decide If you can make it Lou will send you a formal invitation letter Please let me know if I can provide any other information for you Thanks Gail Conference Title Americas CEO Conference Event Date June and Location IBM Industry Solutions Lab Hawthorne New York Conference The Conference designed for open dialogue Overview and interaction provides a forum for chief executives to discuss a range of critical business issues with Lou Gerstner and members of the IBM senior management team The Conference is focused on the critical role of information technology on business strategy and how enterprises can best leverage that technology for competitive advantage We will discuss the importance of endtoend integration and how ebusiness can strengthen supply chains and enhance customer relationships Event Description Conference is held on June at the IBM Industry Solutions Lab and is attended by the CEOs Lou Gerstner Sam Palmisano Bill Etherington and Dave Carlucci Dinner is scheduled the evening prior at La Panetiere Based on the attending CEOs additional Global and or Sector VPs may be asked to assist in hosting the dinner Following are the CEOs who attended the Americas November CEO Conference CEO COMPANY John McLennan ATT Canada Corp John McFarlane Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Limited Roy Vallee Avnet Inc Tom Ridge Commonwealth of Pennsylvania Joe Magliochetti Dana Corporation Bob Lane Deere Company Chuck Conaway Kmart Corporation Vance Coffman Lockheed Martin Corporation Bill Marriott Marriott International Bruce Nelson Office Depot Jim Rohr PNC Financial Services Group Inc Martin Madaus Roche Diagnostics Corporation John Cleghorn Royal Bank of Canada Bob King State University of NY Jim Blanchard Synovus Financial Corp Ramani Ayer The Hartford Ray Kelly US Customs Service Americas CEO Conference Tentative Agenda Americas CEO Conference Tuesday June La Panetiere Rye New York pm Reception pm Dinner pm After Dinner Reception Wednesday June IBM Industry Solutions Lab Hawthorne am Arrival Coffee am Welcome Introduction Dave Carlucci am CEO Perspective Lou Gerstner am Coffee Break am ebusiness Inside IBM Sam Palmisano am Solutions Tour Bill Etherington Dave Carlucci pm Lunch pm Next Generation ebusiness Bill Etherington pm Closing Remarks Lou Gerstner pm Adjourn Gail P Whipple Managing Director Enron IBM Westchester Avenue White Plains NY fax email
